entry.title: Install Xilinx ISE on the Ubuntu
entry.content:
Download Xilinx ISE

Official site: http://www.xilinx.com/support/download/index.htm

Choose Full Installer for Linux

Install

bash Install cd the folder untar the archives sudo chmod +x xsetup sudo ./xsetup 1. Just use the default install path: /opt/Xilinx 2. Uncheck Install cable drivers(if checked, it will pop the error info below, just click OK.
  1. The Xilinx License Configuration Manager appears
  2. Finish

Installing Cable Drivers

  1. install the prerequisite

bash install On 32-bit sudo apt-get install gitk git-gui libusb-dev build-essential libc6-dev fxload On 64-bit sudo apt-get install gitk git-gui libusb-dev build-essential libc6-dev-i386 fxload

  1. Download the driver source and install
